overview: Michael Frasier is the Director of Business Development for InComm. Over the past 4 years he has been instrumental to InComm’s growth in product partner acquisitions and the subsequent successful retail launches of Zynga, Facebook, Jagex and Wizard 101. He has provided critical insight and direction in prepaid card monetization planning and understanding retailer “Go to Market” strategies. Prior to his service at InComm, Frasier was the Manager for Gaming Partnerships at Panasonic where he managed Nintendo’s Gamecube, DS and the launch of the Mega Hit platform – Wii.
